name: Growing Beat (Ludum Dare #34)
description:
Let the beat grow into your body, and make music out of randomness.

May also contain a parallel story about life, very subtle.

It's a simple rhythm game with two buttons: left and right arrow.

Made in 5 hours for Ludum Dare #34 the 14th of December 2015.

WARNING: the pattern may not be in rhythm with music. A refresh can sometimes do the trick, if not I don't know how to fix that.. sorry. Turns out it's not that easy to solve this issue, especially for a no coder like me :(
